page.title: 06Withybush and Pelcomb
page.content: { ** Withybush **} is a part of the Fishguard Road between Prendergast and Tangier.On the side of the road is Withybush General Hospital, Withybush Airfield, a Rugby Club, houses, shops and a Post Office; also the Electricity Board has a depot here. {** Pelcomb ** { }When we went to Pelcomb we went up on the St.Davids Road and came back on the Haven Road. On the way we saw a few scattered farms with land round them. Just after the Pelcomb Bridge was the Rising Sun which is a Public House. This has a large caravan site behind it. By Pelcomb Green we turned off into the village of Pelcomb, through a very narrow lane, and past the Church.
